content: उरु {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [ऊर्णु-कु नुलोपो ह्रस्वश्च <ls>Uṇ. 1. 31</ls>] (रु-र्वी {%<ab>f.</ab>%}; <ab>compar.</ab> वरीयस्; super. वरिष्ठ) {@--1@} Wide, spacious. {@--2@} Great, large; <ls>R. 6. 74.</ls> {@--3@} Exces sive, much, abundant; धनान्युरूणि <ls>Śi. 3. 76.</ls> {@--4@} Excellent, precious, valuable. {%--<ab>n.</ab>%} <ab>Ved.</ab> Wide space, space or room. {%--<ab>ind.</ab>%} Far, far off (<ab>Ved.</ab>)
